Package com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.devices

Classes for access and control of media capture devices such as the camera and mic

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    WZAudioDevice.AudioSampleListener  
    WZCameraView.PreviewStatusListener
    Callback interface to use with WZCameraView.setPreviewReadyListener(PreviewStatusListener)
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    WZAudioDevice
    Encode an audio stream The object wraps a media encoder running on a dedicated thread.
    WZCamera
    The WZCamera class provides an interface for accessing and controlling a camera device.
    WZCameraView
    The WZCameraView class provides a custom View class for previewing the video captured from a camera device.
    WZDeviceUtils
    The WZDeviceUtils class contains a set of device-related utility classes

Package com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.devices Description

Classes for access and control of media capture devices such as the camera and mic
